description.value:
Your divine power allows you to fly, using a means appropriate for your religion (wings, currents of air, gravity control, jets of flame, and so on). You gain a Fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Special. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-ancestries-demigods.feat-dnd5e.Item.CogToxiimypUYbwp]{Divine Flight} or @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-ancestries-demigods.feat-dnd5e.Item.8jUIsnl6V0z5691N]{Perpetual Flight} species feat (or both), you can immediately exchange those feats for any demigod species feat of the same or lower level.
